name: Introduction to Databases
description: Introduction to database management systems. The relational data model. Relational algebra. Querying and updating databases: the SQL query language. Application programming with SQL. Integrity constraints, normal forms, and database design. Elements of database system technology: query processing, transaction management.
prerequisites: CSCB09H3 and CSCB63H3 [CGPA 3.0 or enrolment in a CSC Subject POSt]
